name: Battle in Frying Pan
description:
My second experiment on what it looks like if Crush Gear or BattleBots be made as a silly game 😋
Previous prototype can be seen here

As usual, you can only steer your vehicle/toy. No gas or brake!

Unlike the previous game which is battle royal, this time you are in PvP frying pan facing an A.I. Crash your vehicle and ram it to your opponent. Be careful with the frontal attack! It hurt a lot and can send you flying.
